Reviews.Title: Great Phone for a Dinosaur
Reviews.Author: The Dinosaur
Reviews.Content: In a time when everyone is looking for the latest smartphone, If you are like me, and all you want is a good dependable rugged phone. The Motorola W385 fits the bill. Nothing fancy, excellent call quality, easy to understand functions, and very important long battery life I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Cell Phone for Verizon Wireless...
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I just love this phone...  Its like the Razar but nicer...Great sound, nice screen, and has a very nice look, very slim, fits in my jean pockets nicely...GREAT!  AAA+++

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service. Twice!!!
Reviews.Author: KMS
Reviews.Content: I will order from this company in the future. Very impressed with customer service and professionalism!I mentioned on my initial review of the phone I ordered that the battery did not hold a charge, and had arrived without a back on it. As previously mentioned, the company was quick to reply and send me a back for the phone (which I had requested), but without even requesting so they also sent a new battery.Kudos and much success to you!

Reviews.Title: It will have to do for now
Reviews.Author: Frank_IFA
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my mom as a cheap replacement phone for the one she had prior. She needed a simple clam shell phone with nothing fancy, just dial in a number and talk kinda phone. I was able to activate the phone by dialing *228 with no problems.Pros- cheapest decent phone I could find for the money. Long battery life,e asy to use.Cons- Feels cheap, the battery cover button is poorly made. Everything about this screams made in China. The battery cover is made out of tin with the same feel as the top of a soup can. Right off the bat I had to break off the USB charger cover as there was no grove to remove it with your finger.Overall, I felt the phones on the verizon website are way over priced and this is a good option for those that are in need of a new working phone and don't care for spending the big bucks.

Reviews.Title: Reliable
Reviews.Author: J.D.
Reviews.Content: I had previously had the W385 for 2.5 years.  I went back to this phone (W385) after having a Samsung Intensity II.  After keys not functioning correctly on the Intensity II and breaking the screen accidentally I bought W385 once again.  From the supplier this phone came with a Clean ESN so that the phone could be programed to my number.I have never had an issue with this W385.  If you want a cell phone that is decent to text on and nice to talk on, and do not need a data plan, this is the phone to get.  Regardless if you are a teen, an older person, or like me at age 24 who doesn't need a data plan, GET THIS PHONE!  I would recommend this phone to anyone else who is looking for a phone with very basic features.

Reviews.Title: Tank Phone
Reviews.Author: David McBride
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best. It cannot die. CAN NOT DIE. thus we call it tank phone. because it is a tank and it is a phone

Reviews.Title: Phone works great
Reviews.Author: Tina Goode
Reviews.Content: These guys really know what the are doing..  They got my phone  activated when I need it ...And Verizon would OR could not!! THANKS!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Verizon phone
Reviews.Author: franny
Reviews.Content: I bought this older phone for someone who liked his old one and did not want to upgrade. Was very happy with it. Went online to Verizon and activated it without a problem. Very pleased. Quick delivery.

Reviews.Title: Motorola W385
Reviews.Author: V. Wolter
Reviews.Content: Purchased a two year contract from Verizon on two of these phones in a family plan several years ago. The phones are great little devices that handle most of what we were looking for. One of the problem we have found its that the batteries tend to start loosing the ability to keep a charge so that even on short calls the battery indicator will drop down to one bar and a recharge is necessary. Another problem is that pictures taken with this phone cannot be downloaded to your computer with the Motorola Phone Tools 5.0 application as this part is not supported for this phone.

Reviews.Title: don't buy it
Reviews.Author: honggang sheng
Reviews.Content: I bought the basic phone only for better quality of voice. But it is hard to hear when I am using this phone.In addition, the battery only can support 2 days.....

Reviews.Title: great simple phone
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 90 year old mother.  She has no trouble dialing or using the contacts list.  Contacts are white font highlighted in black for active contact.  She loves the clock on the outer screen.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: LC
Reviews.Content: Just received the W385 phone from DirectBuy Wireless.  I was worried that it would be scratched and old but I was amazed at how great the phone looks.  It is in great shape.  Looks new!!  Phone was received timely and couldn't be happier!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Vendor Services & Product
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: We found the Amazon Vendor to be excellent and responsive; we had a power related problem and the they promptly provided us a new battery that otherwise served to fully and completely resolve the problem. I would speak highly of them. My Wife uses the phone with comfort and we were able to sync the device with her new car as well as her Blue Tooth Earpiece. We had another new 4G Phone System in the Box but in fact, she prefers simplicity and only uses the phone as a phone.As to Verizon, they are quite outrageous, inaccurate and abrasive, making false and unsupported claims and statements. At one point they even allowed access to their database and my personal records; which were sold to a 3rd. Party for use in a litigation not involving me, without any form of knowledge, consent and/or approval. This was done in violation of lawful mandates imposed upon them.Respectfully submitted.

Reviews.Title: Did what we bought it for
Reviews.Author: Jeff R
Reviews.Content: My son-in-law is part of our family plan and he goes through phones at an alarming rate! We usually carry insurance, but he found a fancy phone at a good price, but as a refurbished unit couldn't get the coverage. Broke it a couple of months later, and we needed a phone just to get us through the two remaining months before his upgrade opportunity opened. This one did the trick. Fewer features than he liked - but it did all that was needed with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Rugged, reliable phone with good sound repro
Reviews.Author: Rod Kenzig "Rod"
Reviews.Content: Looking for a simple, easy to carry and easy to use cell phone showed me how hard it was to find one these days, but this phone solved the problem for me. I like it a lot, especially for its high level of ruggedness. Thanks for letting me share this.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!  Tough and reliable
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I've had my W385 for over 3-4 years.  It is banged up and has been dropped many times.  I even left it out in the rain overnight and it still works great.  It doesn't have nifty features and the camera is low rent, so if that's important, you may need something else.It uses a standard mini USB port for charging and data, so you can charge it from many different chargers or even a PC if you download the drivers from Motorola. Any standard USB-to-mini cable will work.  Best of all, you can use it as a modem (at least on MetroPCS).  It's not easy, but it can be done.Oh yes, it also makes phone calls and will receive them too.

Reviews.Title: Rugged, Long battery life,  Basic phone
Reviews.Author: Cleech
Reviews.Content: I've had the Motorola W385 for at least 5 years, probably longer.  It doesn't have a QWERTY keyboard, so it's really not suitable for texting.  And, in general, I don't find the interface all that intuitive. However, given those limitations, it's a great phone.Here's what I like:It's a flip phone.  Phone rings, flip it open to answer, close it to end.  Just like Captain Kirk.It's thin and easily slips into my pocket.The outside of the phone is covered mostly with what feels like rubber.  Easy to grip, looks cool.I've had no problems with the phone even though I've dropped it a few times and gotten it wet.It seems to have a large number-storing capacity.I've set mine to ring and vibrate simultaneously.  I understand that not all phones allow this.Typically, it stays charged for a week; or a least it did until recently, (I'm now down to two or three days, so I've ordered a new battery).Despite what is said in some of the other reviews:The recharging port cover does have a groove that allows you easily open the port cover and move it to one side.You can down load ring tones, page 42 in manual.According to the manual, you can send pictures to other phones or email addresses.  Although I've yet to try that feature, since I don't text.After 5 years of use and abuse, instead of getting a new phone, I've just ordered a new battery for my trusty Motorola W385 flip phone.  I like it that much.

Reviews.Title: If You Want Just A Plain Phone
Reviews.Author: Miss Missy
Reviews.Content: I talk on the phone all day and work on a computer all day so at the end of a day I don't need the texting, the aps or the searching, I've done it all day.  Just give me a plain phone for actual talking, not texting, to a person.  Fits easily in your jeans pocket too.

Reviews.Title: Great phone,  poor support
Reviews.Author: Stu
Reviews.Content: The phone works really well.  The only problem is that it is no longer supported by Verizon. As a result, even though the phone has GPS, it is not possible to use VZnavigator.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Paula Walsh "kitty"
Reviews.Content: company ran out of the phones I order but gave me a upgrade on a better phone. The cover on the phone was loose other wis it was fine

Reviews.Title: I Don't like this phone
Reviews.Author: Styx_Ray
Reviews.Content: This is my second cell phone and I hate it, I have had it more than a year and I still find the buttons confusing and I can't get my photos off the camera.  I plug the phone to my PC via USB and nothing.  Everything says I have to email the photos, but unfortunaly the phone will not email I think it requires another level of service.  But there is no money in the budget for more service.I want my old LG phone back.

Reviews.Title: VERIZON WIRELESS MOTOROLA W385
Reviews.Author: THOMAS BROWN "THOMAS L BROWN"
Reviews.Content: PLEASE DON'T GET THIS PHONE FOR A TEENAGER. MY OPINION IT IS DESIGNED FOR AN OLDER PERSON 50 AND ABOVE WHO ONLY WANTS TO TALK AND NOT INTERESTED IN DOWNLOADS OR TEXT MESSAGES.MAYBE SOME ELEMENTARY KIDS WHO WILL FEEL GOOD TO ONLY HAVE A PHONE AND TO TALK TO THEIR SCHOOL FRIENDS.THIS IS JUST NOT FOR ME, SORRY I HAD TO RETURN THIS  ITEM I WAS NOT SATISFIED FOR THIS USE IT WOULD GIVE. I LIKE MY RING TONES AND MUSIC DOWNLOADS.
